description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: 12 Reasons Why Infographics Still Matter in SEOOver the last few years, Infographics have gained a lot of popularity on the Internet, especially on various social media sites such as Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest. Despite what some naysayers have stated about infographics, they continue to be a popular medium to spread awareness about your business and increase social shares.General SEOSep 04, 2020

headers.text: 12 Reasons Why Infographics Still Matter in SEO
